Home » 40P15 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
75 Saraṇaduka, Vitakkattika
Saraṇaduka, Vitakkattika
86.
232Saraṇaṃ savitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasavitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
233Araṇaṃ savitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo nasavitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  ekaṃ.
234Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve…pe…  vipāke ekaṃ…pe…  avigate cattāri.
87.
235Saraṇaṃ avitakkavicāramattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naavitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… . Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve…pe…  vipāke ekaṃ…pe…  avigate cattāri.
236Araṇaṃ avitakkaavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naavitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ.
